description: This Java class 'FundTransferMapper' extends a 'BaseMapper' to convert between 'FundTransfer' DTOs and 'FundTransferEntity' objects, utilizing Spring's BeanUtils for property copying. It serves as a mapper component within the application's model layer.

classes.name: FundTransferMapper
classes.description: A mapper class for converting between FundTransfer entity and DTO objects through property copying.

methods.name: convertToEntity
methods.description: Converts a 'FundTransfer' DTO to a 'FundTransferEntity', copying properties if the input DTO is not null.

methods.name: convertToDto
methods.description: Converts a 'FundTransferEntity' to a 'FundTransfer' DTO, copying properties if the entity is not null.
